title: Missing Map Location
body: The map location where Ryze sees the void monster in the cinematic seems to be missing. I remember it being up in the northwestern part of the map in the part of the Frejlord that is mostly empty (as far as we know). I could be wrong but I can't find it anywhere? :(

replies.body: The event still took place in that location, but we moved the image and information down into the Void - Voidborn gallery. Hope that helps!
Is there any way you guys could have it in both places, just for us lore nerds' sake? =)

We will be updating content every time we launch new stuff for the map. In this case, the location was not named, so we decided not to keep it associated with a specific location.

Points of interest will not always remain in a specific location. The wharf rats of Bilgewater, for example, are not exclusive to that point on the map... :-)
For a minute I thought this thread was about Kumungu Jungle...

Also quick mistake I noticed 

The City of Gardens has description text meant for the Zoantha Falls
Canonicly it still happened there but it looks like the indicator is just no longer there.
